translations: n.引用，引号；报价（quote 的复数）
v.报价（quote 的第三人称单数）；引用；复述

sentences.sentence: If you take text from other sources, place it in quotes.
sentences.translation: 引用其他来源的资料要放在引号里。

sentences.sentence: Quotes and estimates can be prepared by computer on the spot.
sentences.translation: 报价和估价可以当场用电脑做出来。
